EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Seattle ISV Training Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Seattle | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Seattle, WA.
We are very excited to be hosting this event. In the past, partners who have attended the event have been able to significantly fast track their integration with the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. We hope you'll find it as valuable as well.
What: Pivotal Partner Days: Software Integration Workshop When: September 12-14, 2017 Where: Galvanize - Pioneer Square, 111 South Jackson Street, Seattle, WA 98104
Please review what you need to prepare and bring <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/seattle/software-integration-workshop#beforeyouarrive]]> prior to the event.
Questions? Please contact Marina Joseph, Technical Program Manager, ISV Engineering, Pivotal Cloud Foundry at mjoseph@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mjoseph@pivotal.io]]>.
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry ISV Engineering Team
